```{r}
mtcars_dt <- as.data.table(mtcars)
mtcars_dt[, carname := rownames(mtcars)]

dt1 <- mtcars_dt[5:25,.(carname, mpg, cyl)]
dt2<- mtcars_dt[1:10, .(carname, gear)]
```

1.
